lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Industry analysts also said the 12 point drop in the company's stock to 37-1/4 was largely expected in light of the speculative nature of the biotechnology companies whose fortunes often depend on the success of an important drug.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Last Friday, an advisory committee at the Food and Drug Administration, FDA, withheld a recommendation on Genentech's tissue plasminogen activator, a drug called Activase.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Athough it supported Genentech's claim that the drug dissolves blood clots, the FDA said it wanted data that showed the treatment benefits heart-attack victims.
